alert.note: Alert for DeSoto; Hardee; Highlands (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued December 22 at 11:55PM EST by NWS Tampa Bay
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Highlands, Hardee and northern DeSoto Counties through 1230 AM EST... At 1155 PM EST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Arcadia, moving northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Sebring, Avon Park, Arcadia, Wauchula, Sebring Regional Airport, Southeast Arcadia, Ona, Sweetwater, Zolfo Springs, Nocatee, Limestone, Brownville, Sebring Shores, Lake Josephine, Avon Park Air Force Range, Gardner, Crewsville and Placid Lakes. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
